title: SERIOUS HELP NEEDED!
content:
How to apply for the btech program , i'm really confused coz they have mentioned that FEB 19 was the last day to update jee score but i was unaware of it . Am i still eligible to apply thru mains quota??

and btw Can i get CS/ECE at RR campus at this score??

comments.body: Call the management pes will definitely consider your score, call em now
is the fee way to high compared to kcet admissions?
ya obv lol, your 1yr JEE fees at PES == KCET 4 yrs fees at PES
Through kcet na and what about management quota?
thru management it'll be around 60-70L overall
Seriously recommend joing PES through either CET or COMEDK.
i mailed them regarding this , they replied to fill the registration and complete the payment for now and to update the jee score after the second attempt
So the competition will be high after 2nd attempt because everyone will start applying for colleges? Or there are separate seat( like 22.5%) for 2nd attempt?
So much confirm with wrong info ðŸ’€
just 'cuz you CAN get in, doesnt mean you should
Not everyone can write kcet bruh
